import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import {Context} from './Context' import {IoIosTimer, IoMdEye, IoMdCheckmark, IoIosAirplane, IoIosStar} from "react-icons/io"; import {FaDollarSign, FaRegCalendarAlt, FaEbay, FaFlagUsa} from 'react-icons/fa' import {FiPackage} from 'react-icons/fi' import {AiOutlineShoppingCart} from "react-icons/ai"; import BuyBox from './ProductPage/BuyBox' import AuctionBox from './ProductPage/AuctionBox' import AuctionBuyBox from './ProductPage/AuctionBuyBox' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html'; const ProductPage = (item) => { const {product, itemspec} = useContext(Context) const date = new Date() var months = ["Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"]; console.log(product) let endingTime = (itemspec != "") ? itemspec.Item.TimeLeft.toString() : null let endingTime1 = (itemspec != "") ? endingTime.substring( endingTime.lastIndexOf("P") + 1, endingTime.lastIndexOf("D")) : null let endingTime2 = (itemspec != "") ? endingTime.substring( endingTime.lastIndexOf("T") + 1, endingTime.lastIndexOf("H")) : null let endingTime3 = (itemspec != "") ? endingTime.substring( endingTime.lastIndexOf("H") + 1, endingTime.lastIndexOf("M")) : null return (

{(itemspec != "") ? itemspec.Item.Title : null}

{(itemspec != "") ? itemspec.Item.Watching : null} watching
{endingTime1}d {endingTime2}h {endingTime3}M left

{(itemspec != "") ? itemspec.Item.Seller.UserID : null}

{(itemspec != "") ? (itemspec.Item.Seller.TopRatedSeller ?

Top Seller

: null) : null}

{(itemspec != "") ? itemspec.Item.Seller.PositiveFeedbackPercent : null}

{(itemspec != "") ? (itemspec.Item.ListingType == "FixedPriceItem" ? : ) : null}
) } export default ProductPage
